text: Ajit Bhandari (; born February 7, 1994) is a Nepalese footballer who plays as a defender for Nepal Police Club and the Nepal national team. ==International career== Bhandari made his international debut in a goalless friendly draw against Kuwait on 21 March 2019. He earned a yellow card in the match. == International statistics == {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !
